lyrics.stanza: Lord, we want to live You In the most intimate And the closest contact, Closest contact with You. Acting according To the index of Your eyes; A person one with Christ, Full of Christ.

And one who is saturated with Christ One who is so broken And even terminated In his natural life, Softened and flexible in his will, Affectionate, yet restricted in emotions, Sober and considerate in his mind, And pure, genuine in his spirit.
This is for the benefit Of all the believers That they may experience And enjoy Christ For the fulfillment of God's purpose In the building up of Christ's Body, In the building up of Your Body.
